head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KORNREICH, MORTON A.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KORNREICH, MORTON A.

block.p: KORNREICH--Morton A. The Albert Einstein College of Medicine of Yeshiva University notes with profound sorrow the passing of Morton Kornreich, respected member of the College's Society of Founders and beloved brother of our good friend and former Overseer, Matthew Kornreich. The Kornreich and Weinberg families have been leading supporters of medical research and education at Einstein for many years. To the entire family, we extend our heartfelt condolences. Yeshiva University Richard M. Joel, President Norman Lamm, Chancellor Morry Weiss, Chairman Board of Trustees Albert Einstein College of Medicine Ira M. Millstein, Chairperson Board of Overseers Allen M. Spiegel, MD The Marilyn and Stanley M. Katz Dean

KORNREICH--Morton A. The Albert Einstein College of Medicine of Yeshiva University notes with profound sorrow the passing of Morton Kornreich, respected member of the College's Society of Founders and beloved brother of our good friend and former Overseer, Matthew Kornreich. The Kornreich and Weinberg families have been leading supporters of medical research and education at Einstein for many years. To the entire family, we extend our heartfelt condolences. Yeshiva University Richard M. Joel, President Norman Lamm, Chancellor Morry Weiss, Chairman Board of Trustees Albert Einstein College of Medicine Ira M. Millstein, Chairperson Board of Overseers Allen M. Spiegel, MD The Marilyn and Stanley M. Katz Dean
